text: Manye mbu obulamu bwokhushialo nomubayo nende okhukalilisia, nende okhwirona nende okhwilaya mwinywe nende okhushilana khumiandu nende Abana, bili shinga ifula, yemimela chiabu chisangasia abalimi, mana chitse chiume chikalukhane namabuyu mana chibe amasakaria, ne mwikulu khuli neshinyasio nende obulesheli nende okhufuchililwa okhurula khu Nyasaye, ne obulamu bwokhushialo shinishiosi shiosi tawe halali omwikhoyo kwobubeyi
